Account_Already_Exists: An account with this information already exists.
Account_Not_Found: We couldn't find an account with that username or email.
Plugin_Conflicts_Message: This plugin has informed us that it conflicts with other plugins you've installed, please contact the plugin author for more details.
Plugin_Hibernate: This plugin makes use of the Hibernate system. This means it will be loaded when it is needed, improving your website's speed.
Plugin_NotLoaded_Message: This plugin was not loaded by Saturn.
PowerFeatures_Message: Power Features are features built in to Saturn's Plugin Loader designed to speed up your website.
PowerFeatures_Hibernate_Message: This plugin will only load when it is needed.
PowerFeatures_None: This plugin does not use any Power Features.
SecurityAlert_Checksums: One or more settings files have been changed outside of Saturn resulting in their checksums to become invalid. If you have changed the files manually, it is safe to reset their values. Otherwise, please check the files are correct before resetting.
SecurityAlert_Disabled: Saturn has been temporarily disabled due to a security alert.
SecurityAlert_NoPermissions: You do not have the required permissions to resolve the alert, please ask a website administrator to log in and resolve the issue.
SecurityAlert_ResetConfirm: Please confirm you'd like to reset checksums
Uninstall_Confirm_Message: Please confirm you'd like to uninstall
Uninstall_Error: There was an issue whilst attempting to uninstall. Please try again later or remove it manually from the file system.
Unknown_Error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
Unknown_Success: Something went well, but the system that sent you here didn't say what exactly it was.
